statements: DELETE FROM activity_logs WHERE query_type = 'SELECT' AND user_id = 200;
DELETE FROM database_activity_logs WHERE id = 10 AND user_id = 5;
DELETE FROM suspicious_activities WHERE detected_at < '2021-08-01' AND description LIKE '%suspicious%';
DELETE FROM sql_activity_logs WHERE log_id = 100 AND user_id = 5;
DELETE FROM activity_suspicious_logs WHERE timestamp < '2022-01-01' AND log_id IN (SELECT log_id FROM sql_activity_logs);
DELETE FROM alerts WHERE user_id = 10 AND log_id = 3;
DELETE FROM DetectedActivities WHERE user_id = 100 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM SuspiciousActivities WHERE activity_id = 500 AND timestamp > '2022-03-01';
